properties.name: encodeExecutableContent
properties.description: Specifies if the CSV export routine saves potentially dangerous content as plain text data.

properties.name: keepColumnWidths
properties.description: Specifies whether Excel columns should have the same width as their source UI component's columns.

properties.name: topLeftCell
properties.description: A cell used as a start position for export.

properties.name: worksheet
properties.description: An Excel worksheet to which the grid should be exported.
